title: Justinjjhcs1
author: Justinjjhcs1
content: I stopped mining Bitcoin because of the Ins ain money you had to shell out for Hardware..What Can I mine with 2 50 G/Hs grid seed miners, I would be happy making 50 bucks a week.Never figured out what string to usecurrently on slush poolbfgminer.exe stratum+tcp://stratum.slushpool.com:3333 -u Justinjjhcs1 -p abc123 Or did I do this wrong, It has been 4 years according to my pool?
